brief.brief: Determines whether to save a copy of the primary table's record before modifying the record.
This field is only available on updates and deletes.
If the condition is false, Service Manager displays a validation error message and stops running the operation.

detail.detail: Putting this expression in the validations section of Format Control ensures that data in a field called sales.amount remains unchanged.
It keeps an operator from changing selected fields within the record:
The file variable associated with the original copy is $file0.
